summary: The kitchen clip has an underrated kiss at the end, and it's probably my favorite from them. The things they said to each other...
question: The kitchen clip has an underrated kiss at the end, and it's probably my favorite from them. The things they said to each other and then the kiss... I don't know, I loved it.
answer: is this kiss really an underrated one? i don’t even know because i don’t even go in tags ahah, but i feel like people love every moment with them (or almost every one) anyway!! yes i love this kiss and i love their conversation that they had and how lucas wanted to talk about what concerns him and eliott saying that he’s not going anywhere (and like literally i bet he’s still at lucas’), so yes i loved this clip and this scene!!

reblog.comment: is this kiss really an underrated one? i don’t even know because i don’t even go in tags ahah, but i feel like people love every moment with them (or almost every one) anyway!! yes i love this kiss and i love their conversation that they had and how lucas wanted to talk about what concerns him and eliott saying that he’s not going anywhere (and like literally i bet he’s still at lucas’), so yes i loved this clip and this scene!!

I'm not going to survive.....

summary: Would you like it if Eliot told Lucas about his MI? I would love if Lucas knew and did some research and knew how to handle it...
question: Would you like it if Eliot told Lucas about his MI? I would love if Lucas knew and did some research and knew how to handle it when it happens. I think that would be very powerful. Like Lucas taking charge and being there and fighting for his man and relationship. Like maybe Eliot doesn’t run out naked because Lucas keeps him busy and we have a completely different scene with eliots mania. I doubt it would happen but still. I’d love to see that.
answer:
I doubt it’ll happen that way too because of the scenes that would inevitably be cut out because of a change like that. And they’re pretty big scenes, so…

But I do agree that that would be incredible!! And so much better for Eliott, to finally be brave enough to tell Lucas and have someone understand and support him 💓💗💕 *cries*

reblog.comment:
